inclusion.criterion: First-degree relatives of an index patient
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: father, mother, children, brothers and sisters (aged more than 18 years)

inclusion.criterion: Informed and oral consent of the participant after clear and fair information on the study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is in relation with several partners and use condom during the intercourse

exclusion.criterion: The persons concerned by the articles L.1121-5 to L1121-8 and L.1122-1-2 of the Code de la santé publique
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41 year man with itchy foot, localized scaling and maceration between third and fourth toe of right foot.
